org.cougaar.mts.std.experimental
Class FuseServerSocket

java.lang.Object
  java.net.ServerSocket
      org.cougaar.mts.base.ServerSocketWrapper
          org.cougaar.mts.std.experimental.FuseServerSocket

public class FuseServerSocket
extends ServerSocketWrapper

This test entity can be used as a wrapper for RMI ServerSockets. If too many outstanding connections are open from any one client host, it will not allow any more.
